issue.description: The characterization needs to be extended to apply to Applied_activity_assignment. Currently the ARM does not allow approval of the assignment of an activity (such as planned maintenance) to the item being maintained. Comment applies to all the select types in the ARM.

description.p: The module should USE FROM process_property_assignment so that the activity properties are brought in. The Activity_property should then be characterized in the same way assigned_property is in ap239_properties. I.e allow the approval, classification, assignment of date time etc to Activity_property.

The characterized_activity_definition select should be extended with Applied_activity_assignment to allow the assignment of properties to the use of an activity. I.e. to allow the representation of the cost of this activity when applied to ???

comment.description: Accept requirement. Applied_activity_assignment is itself not an activity so it was assigned a property by specializing characterized_object instead of an action_property by specalizing action.

issue.description: Support for multiple languages is required. So USE FROM Multi_linguism and extend the string_select select. The mapping to Language_indication and Attribute_translation_assignment will have to be extended. Add Activity to string_select
